steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Go to https://www.gmail.com/ in your computer's web browser. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged into Gmail, enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Enable Google Chat.
steps.content: Enable Google Chat. If you don't see a Chat menu on your Gmail home page, you'll need to enable it in your settings. Do the following: Click the cog icon in the top-right corner. Click Customize under Chat and Meet . Check the box for Google Chat . Click Done . Click Reload .

steps.title: Find your chat name.
steps.content: Find your chat name. You'll find your name and email address listed toward the lower-left side of the page; this is the chat section, which is where you'll be able to select people with whom to chat.

steps.title: Click ＋.
steps.content: Click ＋ . It's to the right of your chat name. Doing so opens a pop-up menu.

steps.title: Select a contact.
steps.content: Select a contact. Click a contact's name in the resulting pop-out menu, or type in a contact's email address or phone number and then click their name in the resulting drop-down menu. If the person's name doesn't show up after searching for them, they probably aren't in your contacts. You'll need to add them to your contacts before you can chat with them.

steps.title: Enter an invitation message.
steps.content: Enter an invitation message. In the text box near the top of the chat window, type in a message (e.g., "Hi! Please add me to your chat contacts.") that you'd like to use to invite your contact to chat with you.

steps.title: Click Send Invite.
steps.content: Click Send Invite . It's a blue button at the bottom of the chat window.

steps.title: Wait for the contact to accept your request.
steps.content: Wait for the contact to accept your request. Once the person accepts your chat request, you'll be able to proceed.

steps.title: Chat with your friend.
steps.content: Chat with your friend. Once your friend accept's your request, you can click ＋ and then click their name to begin chatting with them. Their chat window will open in the far-right side of the page. If you close the chat window, you can always re-open it by clicking the person's name in the chat section on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Initiate a group chat.
steps.content: Initiate a group chat. Click the ＋ icon, then enter a contact's name, click their name when it appears, repeat until you've added the people you want for your group, and click in the top-right corner of the pop-out menu. This will allow you to chat with multiple people at once.

steps.title: Use Gmail to make a voice call.
steps.content: Use Gmail to make a voice call. If you want to call a local number (e.g., not an international line) without using your phone, you can use Gmail's chat feature to make the call: Click the phone-shaped icon below the chats section. Type in the phone number you want to call. Click Call [number] in the resulting drop-down menu.
